data.scheme_name: Dr. Babasaheb Ambedkar Udhyog Uday Yojana for SC/ST Entrepreneurs for MSME - Assistance in Rent to MSEs - SC/ST - Existing
data.benefits: The scheme provides assistance @ 70% of rent paid (reimbursement of Rent paid) by the enterprise with maximum limit of Rs 1 lakh per annum
data.eligibility: Any Micro and Small Enterprise in manufacturing activities which has acquired rented/leased shed will be eligible.
data.conditions:
1. The owner of shed /premises should have legal ownership and possession.
  2. Rent must be paid by cheque/e-payment.
  3. Rent/ lease agreement must be in policy period i.e. from 7th August, 2020 to 6th August, 2021
  4. Applicant need to apply within six months from the date of agreement of rent/lease deed.
  5. Enterprise is eligible for maximum 3 applications with total assistance of Rs.1,00,000/- (One Lakh) per annum during the operative period of the scheme.
  6. Rent/lease deed should be minimum of 11 months (expandable up to 5 year)
  7. Enterprise must be in commercial production.
  8. The assistance of rent will be given with effect from the date of rent deed or three months prior to the date of production whichever is later.
  9. Enterprise shall have to submit required approvals related to shed/premises.
  10. If enterprise submit sublease agreement, then recognized intuitions/authority s Approval/Consent/NOC is required.
  11. Unit must have to provide prior intimation to concern DIC in case of changing its rental premises.
data.beneficiaries: Any Micro and Small Enterprise in manufacturing activities which has acquired rented/leased shed will be eligible.
data.prerequisites:
1. The owner of shed /premises should have legal ownership and possession.
  2. Rent must be paid by cheque/e-payment.
  3. Rent/ lease agreement must be in policy period i.e. from 7th August, 2020 to 6th August, 2021
  4. Applicant need to apply within six months from the date of agreement of rent/lease deed.
  5. Enterprise is eligible for maximum 3 applications with total assistance of Rs.1,00,000/- (One Lakh) per annum during the operative period of the scheme.
  6. Rent/lease deed should be minimum of 11 months (expandable up to 5 year)
  7. Enterprise must be in commercial production.
  8. The assistance of rent will be given with effect from the date of rent deed or three months prior to the date of production whichever is later.
  9. Enterprise shall have to submit required approvals related to shed/premises.
  10. If enterprise submit sublease agreement, then recognized intuitions/authority s Approval/Consent/NOC is required.
  11. Unit must have to provide prior intimation to concern DIC in case of changing its rental premises.
data.context: The primary mission of The Industrial Policy 2020 includes support for development of MSMEs., focus on Export Competitiveness: Vocal for Local to become Global and thus integrated value chains across product segments.
data.objective: To provide assistance by way of reimbursement of rent paid by MSEs.
data.description:
1. The assistance @ 70% of rent paid (reimbursement of Rent paid) by the enterprise with maximum limit of Rs1,00,000/- (one lakh) per annum for SC/ST category.
  2. The assistance will be provided for five years.
data.how_to_apply: Enterprise has to apply online on IFP Portal (https://ifp.gujarat.gov.in) and hard copy at concerned DIC office within six months from the date of agreement of rent/lease deed.
data.funding_facilitator: Industries and Mines Department, Government of Gujarat
data.funding_mechanism: Subsidy will be reimbursed after the commencement of commercial production of enterprise.
data.additional_info: The enterprise that has availed assistance under this component cannot avail asssistance under any other scheme of other department of state government for the same component providing similar benefit. However, Enterprise can avail under such schemes of Government of India, if any.
data.checklist_info_a:
1. Signed copy of Application form* 
2. Copy of Udyam Registration (if applicable) 
3. Constitution of Enterprise (Memorandum of association, partnership deed etc) 
4. Copy of PAN Card of Enterprise 
5. Copy of PAN Card of Applicant/Promoters/Directors/partners and authorised signatory 
6. CA certificate for fixed capital investment 
7. CA certified Share Holding Pattern of Enterprise 
8. Copy of rent / Leased agreement 
9. Copy of Rent Receipt 
10. Copy of Lessorâ€™s PAN Card 
11. Copy of Property Document/ Copy of Index/Copy of sale deed and Copy of the approved plan for the project from Competent Authority/other approvals 
12. Copy of last electricity bill 
13. Undertaking for any assistances from GOG and GOI* 
14. Copy of CA Certified Balance Sheet of the last financial year (if applicable) 
15. Copy of Bank Statement reflecting payment of Rent 
16. GST Registration certificate (if applicable) 
17. Bank details for Real-Time Gross Settlement payment (Cancelled cheque) 
18. Self-Attested documents/ details to be submitted by the Authorized Person 
19. Power of attorney/ Board resolution letter/consent letter 
20. Supporting documents for SC/ST Enterprise
